description: A visual timeline of the attack and the events that followed.
title: Tracking the Aftermath of the Charlie Hebdo Attack
title_page: Tracking the Aftermath of the Charlie Hebdo Attack - The New York Times
maintext:
11 Killed in Newspaper Office
At about 11:20 a.m. Wednesday, at least two men armed with AK-47 assault rifles arrived looking for the Charlie Hebdo offices. They first went to the wrong address, but frightened witnesses waved them off. They then forced a woman entering the newspaperâ€™s offices to let them in. The men killed a guard in the lobby and went to the second floor, where they fired at journalists in a news meeting, officials said.
